narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Share of New Square, INC is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Spring Valley, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $13.1M in Medicaid payments across 34K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $13.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
